item.title: WATCH: Australia bans social media for children under 16
item.description: Children younger than 16 years old will be banned from using social media in Australia starting Wednesday.

item.title: Suspect in shooting of Jets player Kris Boyd arrested and charged: Officials
item.description: A suspect in the Nov. 16 shooting of New York Jets player Kris Boyd has been arrested and charged with attempted murder.
